9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrted:"When the Messenger of Allah stoned the Jamrah, he slaughtered his sacrifice, then he presented the barber the right side (of his head) and he shaved it, then he gave (the hair) to Abu Talhah. Then he presented the left side to him and he shaved it. Then he said: 'Divide it (the hair) among the people

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ بِأَىِّ جَانِبِ الرَّأْسِ يَبْدَأُ فِي الْحَلْقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Which Side Of The Head To Begin With For Shaving
